CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers showed relatively deep HOMO levels that consequently lead to high open circuit voltage of the solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers |
| the solar cell devices |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "polymers" and "the solar cell devices." These entities are mentioned as the materials involved in the discussion of the high open-circuit voltage in solar cell devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymers |

In this revised list, the only valid "Material Name" entity is "polymers." The phrase "the solar cell devices" is not a material name, as it refers to the devices themselves rather than a specific material.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| open circuit voltage |

| open circuit voltage |

Note: I have removed "of the solar cell devices" from "open circuit voltage" as it is not a material property.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All polymers showed relatively deep HOMO levels that consequently lead to high open circuit voltage of the solar cell devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| relatively deep HOMO levels |
| high open circuit voltage |

Explanation:

* "relatively deep HOMO levels" is identified as a Property Value entity because it is a property of the polymers being discussed.
* "high open circuit voltage" is identified as a Property Value entity because it is a property of the solar cell devices being discussed.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| relatively deep HOMO levels |
| high open circuit voltage |

Explanation:

* "relatively deep HOMO levels" is identified as a Property Value entity because it is a property of the polymers being discussed.
* "high open circuit voltage" is identified as a Property Value entity because it is a property of the solar cell devices being discussed.

The other words in the paragraph, such as "polymers", "consequently", "that", "of", "the", "solar cell devices", and "lead" do not clearly refer to a "Value of material property" and are not included in the table.
